text: (avar ciraiccenra camayattil vevveru kurrankalukkaka innum) iru valiparkalum avarutan ciraic cenrarkal. Avviruvaril oruvan (oru nalanru yusuhpai nokki) ‘‘nan tiratcai rasam pilintu kontiruppataka meyyakave kanavu kanten'' enru kurinan. Marravan ‘‘nan en talaiyil rottikalaic cumantu celvatakavum, atai patcikal (kottik kottip) pucippatakavum meyyakave kanavu kanten'' enru kuri (yusuhpai nokki,) ‘‘niccayamaka nankal um'mai mikka (nanamutaiya) nallavarkalil oruvarakave kankirom; atalal, ikkanavukalin viyakkiyanankalai nir enkalukku arivippiraka!'' (Enru kurinan)
